Enumeration Type Documentation

enum MAC_Status_t

MAC primitives' return codes.

Enumerator:
MAC_NO_BEACON_STATUS 

No beacons are received by the device.

MAC_LIMIT_REACHED_STATUS 

There are some unscanned channels yet, but there is no memory.
